2023.title: Canton Network launches
2023.description: A consortium including Goldman, Microsoft and BNP Paribas launched the Canton Network in May 2023 to enable regulated post-trade finance on a blockchain platform.

2023.title: Consensus 2023 in Austin & Dubai
2023.description: CoinDesk’s flagship conference returned May 26‑29, 2023 in Austin, with a second edition in Dubai in March—bringing together enterprise, regulator and DeFi leaders.

2023.title: Top global blockchain events list
2023.description: CryptoTVPlus and Epic Web3 identified key blockchain events worldwide in 2023 (e.g., TOKEN2049 in Europe, Web3 hackathons), underscoring growth in Web3 engagement.
